dt-option.name: language.searchBuilder.button
dt-option.summary: Set the message to be displayed in the SearchBuilder Button

type.description: `-init language.searchBuilder.button` changes what will be displayed in the text of the SearchBuilder Button. It can also display the number of criteria that are active.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init language.searchBuilder.button` parameter is `{0: 'Search Builder', _: 'Search Builder (%d)'}`.
dt-option.description:
As standard, SearchBuilder will set the SearchBuilder Button to display a default text, in this case `{0: 'Search Builder', _: 'Search Builder (%d)'}`. where %d is the total number of criteria that are active.
The value of `-init language.searchBuilder.button` is passed into an `-api i18n()` function. `%d` is replaces by the number of criteria that are in place. To just set the Button text to be a string no matter the count, just set `-init language.searchBuilder.button` to be the desired `-type string`.
